name: Arctic Nine
description:
This is the first (work in progress) episode of Arctic Nine. A passion project by The Literature Club.

Story:

Follow four characters who are surviving on a frozen layer of the ocean, surrounded by clouds the size of mountains, with loud, ominous shots marking noon.

You play as PiGi, a penguin girl who leads the group of four characters.

The second oldest in the group is Sealia! A hyperactive seal who gets in a lot of trouble.

Squid is the second youngest. She is a Shrimp girl who likes playing board games and gets easily scared.

And Sardine-san is a fish.

Features: 

Short Length (30~ minutes of gameplay)

A story that is inspired by Girl's Last Tour and Made in Abyss

A fish sprite

Written by underwaterNotion

Music and Trailer by Canyon (http://canyonsdream.com/)

Art by Navisochi (https://twitter.com/navisochi

Currently, Arctic Nine Episode 1 is all that is slated to release for the foreseeable future without proper support, but there is a lot of story that has yet to be uncovered! If you would like to help out with the development of Arctic Nine, please contact sardinesaniscool@gmail.com .
